body_html:
Having the same issue here.

And I notice that "config_pb2.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True)" of "monitored_session" in lines 965-975 of estimator.py has no gpu memory config
Revise the config to incorporate gpu memory fraction can manually control gpu memory usage again
ex. config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.3

body:
Having the same issue here.

And I notice that "config_pb2.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True)" of "monitored_session" in lines 965-975 of estimator.py has no gpu memory config
Revise the config to incorporate gpu memory fraction can manually control gpu memory usage again
    ex. config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.3
